attributes.action: Raise the legal minimum wage for under 18's to £5.00 per hour and £7.50 per hour for over 18's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think minimum wage should we raised as a lot of jobs aren't even worth getting up at 7am for the money they pay. Especially mine, I work in a care home and sometimes the hassle you get from residents makes you think "I don't get paid enough to deal with this"
